name: Breakfast Box Builder
description:
This is our submission for GDevelop Build/Rebuild theme game jam.

Touch or mouse over the falling breakfast boxes of random sizes before breakfast is over!
Touch or mouse over Falling cereal bowls will spawn 5 cereal boxes and green timers will freeze time for a short period. 

My son and I created all the assets and game logic using Gdevelop! He came up with all the game mechanics as the creative director and MaMa play tested :D 

It seems to work on mobile when accessing through liluo Gdevelop native hosting, testing on itch.io may be needed.
